Ok

To do so, I need to place glass blocks in the crafting grid as follows: glass	empty	glass, empty	glass	empty, glass	empty	glass. The first glass block needs to be placed in slot 1, which I can do by moving the glass block from slot 13 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 13 to slot 1 with quantity 1
